'''''Bulletstorm''''' is an upcoming [[2011 in video gaming|2011]] [[first-person shooter]] [[video game]] developed by [[People Can Fly]] and [[Epic Games]],<ref>http://www.epicgames.com/news/epic-games-and-ea-unleash-the-bulletstorm/</ref> and is published by [[Electronic Arts]] for the[[Xbox 360]].The game is currently scheduled for release on February 22, 2011 in the US and February 25, 2011 in the UK.<ref name="Announcement">{{cite web|url=http://kotaku.com/5513826/first-look-at-gears-of-war--painkiller-creators-bloody-brutal-bulletstorm |title=First Look At Gears Of War & Painkiller Creators' Bloody, Brutal Bulletstorm|first=Michael|last=McWhertor|date=2010-04-09|publisher=[[Kotaku]]|accessdate=2010-04-20}}</ref>
+
'''''Bulletstorm''''' is an upcoming [[2011 in video gaming|2011]] [[first-person shooter]] [[video game]] developed by [[People Can Fly]] and [[Epic Games]],<ref>http://www.epicgames.com/news/epic-games-and-ea-unleash-the-bulletstorm/</ref> and is published by [[Electronic Arts]] for the [[PlayStation 3]], [[Xbox 360]] and [[Microsoft Windows]]. The game is currently scheduled for release on February 22, 2011 in the US and February 25, 2011 in the UK.<ref name="Announcement">{{cite web|url=http://kotaku.com/5513826/first-look-at-gears-of-war--painkiller-creators-bloody-brutal-bulletstorm |title=First Look At Gears Of War & Painkiller Creators' Bloody, Brutal Bulletstorm|first=Michael|last=McWhertor|date=2010-04-09|publisher=[[Kotaku]]|accessdate=2010-04-20}}</ref>
